scripts.install: npm run install:googleAuth && npm run install:rxscan
scripts.install:googleAuth: npm install --prefix googleAuth/backend && npm install --prefix googleAuth/frontend
scripts.install:rxscan: npm install --prefix RXSCAN && npm install --prefix RXSCAN/client && npm install --prefix RXSCAN/server
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev:ga-backend" "npm run dev:ga-frontend" "npm run dev:rx-backend" "npm run dev:rx-frontend"
